feature_model.name: Bicycle feature model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Bicycle(Bicycle) :m Frame(Frame) :g (_r_1_2) [1,1] : Iron(Iron) : Aluminum(Aluminum) : Carbon(Carbon) :g (_r_1_2_5_6) [1,1] : White(White) : Red(Red) : Black(Black) :o Gears(Gears) :o Front(Front) :o Rear(Rear) :m Wheels(Wheels) :m Saddle(Saddle) :m Color(Color) :g (_r_15_16) [1,1] : Red2(Red2) : Green(Green) : Blue(Blue) :m Handle_bars(Handle_bars) :o Pedals(Pedals) :o Warranty(Warranty) :g (_r_22_23) [1,1] : d1_year(d1_year) : d2_years(d2_years) : d3_years(d3_years) :o Maintenance_plan(Maintenance_plan) :g (_r_29_30) [1,1] : f2_years(f2_years) : f3_years(f3_years) : lifetime(lifetime)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~Front or Rear constraint_3:~Carbon or Red2
